metadata.title: Rejuvenate Click N Clean Microfiber Dusting Pad Refill
features: Works well on hard to reach areas wherever the dust bunnies are hiding such as under stairs and underneath furniture and works with the Rejuvenate Click n Clean Spray Mop System
he super soft, synthetic microfiber dust mop pad outperforms other fabrics by trapping and lifting dirt and grit, as well as polishing, dimensions - 0.375 in. x 5.5 in. x 17 in.
With regular household use, the machine-washable applicator can last for years using mild detergent, rinsing and air drying
description: Maximize the dust mop power of Rejuvenate with this Dust Mop Pad Refill. This specially design dust mop microfiber pad refill will likely be your go to pad for daily spot cleaning and high traffic sweeping which will help reduce floor scratches from traffic. Use the refill microfiber dust mop to clean, sweep and prep your floors prior to applying any liquid floor cleaning or restoration products. Use for daily cleaning of dust and light debris as a dust mop. It works well on hard to reach areas such as stairs and underneath furniture. The cleaning pad refills are lined inside for easy attachment and work with the Rejuvenate Click n Clean Spray Mop System. Package includes one replacement dust mop pad that fits the same as new. The replacement microfiber dust mop pad is machine washable (use mild detergent and let air dry) for reuse time and time again. Reveal the Beauty and Make It New Again with Rejuvenate products.
